title: Required age
userStory:
As a user

I would like to input my age

So the website knows how old I am
acceptanceCriteria:
When I enter no age

A validation message should appear stating: 'Your age is required'

When I enter non-numeric characters

A validation message should appear stating: 'Please enter a number between 0 and 100'

When I enter a number between 0 and 100 inclusive

The age is valid

When I enter a number greater than 100

A validation message should appear stating: 'Please enter a number between 1 and 100'

partitions.exampleDescription: If no numbers are entered, the validation will show the age as invalid

partitions.example: a, b, c, d, /, Â£, $, % etc.
partitions.exampleDescription: Anything entered that is not a number is invalid, the validation will show the age as invalid

partitions.description: Inputting any number between 0 and 100 is valid
partitions.exampleDescription: Numbers between 0 and 100 will show the age as valid, e.g. 0, 1, 2, 10, 99, 100

partitions.description: Inputting any number greater than 100 is invalid
partitions.exampleDescription: Numbers greater than 100 such as 101, 999, 10,000 will show the age as invalid

validations.message: Please enter a number between 0 and 100
